title.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 3, 1913. Sabath Chairman of Liquor Committee.

div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 3, 1913. SABATH CHAIRMAN OF LIQUOR COMMITTEE.

body.p: The committee members of Congress held a caucus meeting today with the view of appointing chairmen for the various committees. Congressman Adolph Sabath was appointed chairman of the Liquor Committee.
Congressman Sabath is now the ranking member of the Immigration Committee, and is next in line for the chairmanship of this important committee.
